ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Percussion Bonus for Selos Broken
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you kidding? That sucks big time!  Why do they do this without telling us at least.. I was going to try to get a Selos drum.. is it even worth it now?
ygData.messageBody:
Are you kidding? That sucks big time! Why do they do this without telling
us at least..
I was going to try to get a Selos drum.. is it even worth it now?

Halana 58th Shammie
Tani 39th Bardette
Solusek Ro

> Subject: [eqbards] Percussion Bonus for Selos Broken

>

> Lago
